description:
I am following the Openstack documentation http://docs.openstack.org/mitaka/install-guide-ubuntu/launch-instance-provider.html for installing Openstack on Ubuntu server 14.04., and i have this problem when launch an instance on the provider network.

root@srv-controller:~# openstack server create --debug --flavor 1 --image cirros --security-group default --key-name mykey provider-instance
START with options: ['server', 'create', '--debug', '--flavor', '1', '--image', 'cirros', '--security-group', 'default', '--key-name', 'mykey', 'provider-instance']

title: Could not find resource cirros at launch instance

comments.content: Can you first try to list all available image/flavors to check if that image and flavor exist? Also please attach logs.

comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rgrafagomez

comments.content: I'm having the exact same problem, but I'm running Centos 7.. I've followed the documentation during installation, when it comes to launch a demo instance, it cannot use the cirrus image.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~eddsilva

comments.content: @Rafael: After giving the asked information, please switch the status back to "New". Otherwise it could happen that this report gets closed by mistake.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller

comments.content:
> comment #3
The error in the description suggests that Glance cannot find an image with the name "cirros" because it has an internal error. Please try "openstack image list" (like suggested in comment #1) and attach the *Glance* logs and CLI output.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller

comments.content: @Rafael: If you cannot list images with the Glance CLI, it's possible that you have a wrong configuration of Glance to Keystone, like here: https://ask.openstack.org/en/question/94688/could-not-find-resources-cirros/?sort=latest
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mzoeller

comments.content:
the setting was fine, finally gave up and opt for liberty.

Thanks
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rgrafagomez
